item.description:
This meetup is being organized by Kelley.

As Tall As Lions – 11/12 @ House of Blues Boston, doors @ 7 pm, show @ 8pm; Tickets are $20

As Tall As Lions are an alternative indie-rock band from Long Island, NY who just released their album, You Can’t Take It With You, earlier this year. The band’s vocalist is considered especially noteworthy and has often inspired comparisons to Jeff Buckley and Coldplay, particularly in reviews of their well-received self-titled sophomore album.

Although this is a bit removed from the music I typically find myself listening to, I am excited to see them live after hearing excellent reviews of their live show from friends, and after having their self-titled album on heavy rotation this summer. In my opinion, the beautiful vocals and swirling guitars on this album give it a certain romantic quality, which I really enjoy and think others will too. This should be a great show.

They are opening for a band called MUTEMATH, who I am unfamiliar with. Click on the band names to access their Myspace pages.

Here are some youtube videos for each band:

As Tall As Lions, “Love, Love, Love” off As Tall As Lions

MUTEMATH, “Typical”

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: As Tall As Lions – 11/12 @ House of Blues Boston
